ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: nope, there is definitely rivervale merchants faction and kaladim merchants faction just to name 2.
ygData.messageBody:
nope, there is definitely rivervale merchants faction and kaladim merchants faction
just to name 2.



At 11:02 AM 4/28/00 -0500, you wrote:
>I thought all merchants were beta neutral, meaning they might not sell to
>you, but they wont attack (unless you have bad beta neutral faction). you
>could always just hit sneak to sell
>
>On Fri, 28 Apr 2000, Jeffrey Sue wrote:
>
> > At 10:11 PM 4/27/00 +0000, you wrote:
> > >The negitive is that they are hated by every other race in the world. Try
> > >going to Unrest at 20th or so to collect some of that FS or bronze and hoard
> > >it up till you are twice over your weight limit as an Iksar, then, try to
> > >find a merchant to sell it too who wont kill you on sight.
> > >
> > >Shelza, Karana
> > >Berfurt, Karana
> > i'm betting you will still be able to sell to the druid at the butcherblock druid
> > ring. i thnk that is beta neutral faction. i know for sure, my roommate's necro
> > was able to sell there and he was kos just about everywhere else.
> >
